pr_title: Issue #13363: Beta the jaspic-2.0, jacc-2.0 and appSecurity-4.0 featu…

timeline.message: Issue #13363: Beta the jaspic-2.0, jacc-2.0 and appSecurity-4.0 features.

timeline.bodyText: This should be base instead of core
timeline.author: jhanders34
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -4,5 +4,5 @@ IBM-Provision-Capability: osgi.identity; filter:="(&(type=osgi.subsystem.feature
  osgi.identity; filter:="(&(type=osgi.subsystem.feature)(osgi.identity=io.openliberty.jacc-2.0))"
 IBM-Install-Policy: when-satisfied
 -bundles=io.openliberty.security.authorization.internal.jacc.ejb
-kind=noship
-edition=full
+kind=beta
+edition=core

replies.bodyText: See the comment for this issue below.
replies.author: jvanhill

timeline.bodyText: This should be base instead of core

  osgi.identity; filter:="(&(type=osgi.subsystem.feature)(osgi.identity=io.openliberty.jacc-2.0))"
 IBM-Install-Policy: when-satisfied

timeline.bodyText: This should be base instead of core
timeline.author: jhanders34

replies.bodyText: See the comment for this issue below.
replies.author: jvanhill

timeline.bodyText: You made this core because your feature depends on it.  I see that jpaContainer also depends on it.  I wonder if both your and the jpaContainer features should depend on the interface feature / bundle instead of the impl.  Then this feature could stay base.
timeline.author: jhanders34
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,4 +23,4 @@ Subsystem-Name: Jakarta XML Bindings 3.0
 -bundles=\
   io.openliberty.jaxb.3.0.internal.tools
 kind=beta
-edition=base
+edition=core

replies.bodyText: See the comment for this issue below.
replies.author: jvanhill
